department.dept_long_name: Committee on Higher Degrees in Biostatistics

course.title: Advanced Computational Biology and Bioinformatics
course.faculty_text: Winston Hide (Public Health) and Guocheng Yuan (Public Health)
course.description: Students will explore current topics in computational biology in a seminar format with a focus on interpretation of 'omics data. They will develop skills necessary for independent research using computational biology.
course.prerequisites: Biostatistics 298 or permission of instructor required.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO513.
